_comment: Created by ianb on 01/10/2014 12:02:23 using v2.1
title: How often are people having care review meetings?
analysis_commentary: As we would expect, a higher proportion of people on CPA are having reviews more than once a year, compared to those not on CPA. In 2013, 42% of people on CPA had more than one review meeting a year, compared to 26% not on CPA. These proportions haven't changed much from the previous years. No data was collected on the number of care reviews in 2014.
data_source: Care Quality Commission, Community Mental Health Survey
